title: Bug 220686unsynchronized access to WeakHashMap
description: Created attachment 90955 [details]patch to World.javaBuild ID: M200710231652Steps To Reproduce:1. org.aspectj.weaver.World.expendableMap is defined as a java.util.WeakHashMap2. java.util.WeakHashMap is not thread safe3. we have observed that expendableMap can be updated concurrently by multiple threads under load which will corrupt the internal hashmap structure resulting in infinite loops when get() is calledMore information:
